name: clean stables
desc: Working from home.
flavor: It's stable employment.

name: trap soul
desc: Capture a soul within a spirit gem.

name: do chores
desc: Standard apprentice work.
Study arcane scrolls.

name: run errands
desc: Standard apprentice work.
Why study when you can perform parlor tricks for coin?

name: arcane thievery
desc: Use your powers to cajole, coerce, and cudgel gold from the pockets of civilians.

name: magic heist
desc: Orchestrate a theft on a guarded vault.
The portal to true magic.

log.name: Book of Spells
log.desc: Under your master's critical eye, you compile your very own book of spells.

name: offer services
desc: Offer your magical services to the nearby townsfolk.

name: tend animals
desc: Tend to sick and wounded animals in the wild.

name: garden
desc: Study plants and herbs.

name: scry
desc: Knowledge for those who look.

name: concoct potions
desc: Experiment with potions.

name: Attune to elements
desc: Attune to primal forces of the world.

name: mine
desc: Delve the depths for gems of mystic potential. Requires a mine or sufficient geosculpting.
needtext: Must own a mineshaft or be a specialized earth mage.

desc: Spin your dreams upon a tapestry.
flavor: We are the dream-makers.

desc: Turn star shards into dreams.
flavor: Star-light, Star-bright...

name: spin gold
desc: Spin straw into gold.

name: Pillage Graves
desc: Dig up old graves for magical reagents. These guys are like 300 years old, they won't mind.
flavor: It's for a good cause.

desc: An incidental necessity to the advancement of magic.
flavor: Why do they come to me to die?

name: vile experiment
desc: Experiment on dead or soon-to-be-dead subjects. This is not something a good wizard would do.

name: dissect cadaver
desc: Dissect a body for components. Only the best pieces will serve.

name: grind bones
desc: Grind bones into dust

name: powderize skull
desc: Grind a skull into dust

name: funerary rites
desc: Oversee the funerary rites of merchants and nobles.

name: hold seance
desc: Channel spirits for a small fee.

name: treat ailments
desc: Cure customers of magical ailments.

name: read palms
desc: Read palms for a small fee.

name: advise notables
desc: From worried village councils to bumbling barons, they all require your advice.
flavor: Whether they know it or not.

name: hat trick
desc: Pull small objects out of thin air.
flavor: An ordinary wizard's cap.

name: gather herbs
desc: Gather herbs used in potions and alchemy.
The deepest sleep guards the greatest insights.

name: witch's sabbat
desc: A revelry of demons and witches.

name: oppress
desc: Impose your will on the denizens of the world.
Undertake a quest to subdue a great evil.

name: travel
desc: Travel the wide world.
needtext: Must live in a wagon or camp, or must eschew material attachments by becoming a mendicant.
flavor: A tramp abroad.

desc: Pace your home as you contemplate the arcane.

name: buy scroll
desc: A novice can get by with very basic scrolls, hopefully you won't need any of the pricier ones.

name: bag of demons
desc: You'll make your own bags, thank you.
flavor: The research costs a little more than you expected...

name: bag of mayhem
desc: Badger, badger, badger, badger, why are there so many badgers in there???
flavor: And now there's a snake?

name: sublimate lore
desc: Internalize a vast amount of existing knowledge.

name: time siphon
desc: Draw back that which was lost.
flavor: If I could turn back time...

desc: Compendium of common creatures.
Chronicle the myriad strange sights of Dhrune.

name: arcane bestiary
desc: Compendium of magic creatures.

name: codex annihilus
desc: Karnivex's manual of destruction.
flavor: What he lacked in depth, Karnivex made up for with sheer destructive force.

name: markhul's codex
desc: A dusty codex from the genezereth library.

name: sylvan syllabary
desc: A book of elvish symbols.

name: dwarven dirges
desc: A compilation of gloomy dwarven drinking songs.
flavor: Through dungeons deep and caverns old...

name: lemurian lexicon
desc: Interpret the strange whisperings of spirits.

name: demonic dictionary
desc: A compiliation of obscure demonic languages

name: annals of arazor
desc: A history of the eastern region of Arazor.

name: annals of orrem
desc: A history of the lost cities of Orrem.

name: malleus maleficarum
desc: A manual against the darkness.

name: warp landscape
desc: Improve the conditions of your local countryside.

name: call hammer
desc: You forged it once, call forth another.
needtext: Must have at least 1 inventory space free.

name: titan's hammer
desc: The powers of creation and destruction, locked in your grip.
needtext: Must have at least 1 inventory space free.

name: fazbit's fixations
desc: Scribe a copy of the seminal text in practical alchemy.
flavor: Corivar called Fazbit a mad crank, but tried to steal his manuals anyway.

name: corporis fabrica
desc: A manual of the human body.

name: unending scroll
desc: Some scrolls feel interminable.

name: unending codex
desc: Some books never seem to end.

name: unending tome
desc: Some tomes are never finished.
Compile a manual of the sun and stars.

log.name: almagest
log.desc: Your map of the heavens is complete.

name: craft gem
desc: Craft a gem from raw minerals.
Rip out of a piece of your soul and store it in a magic gem.

name: lich
desc: Obtain immortality by becoming a lich
Quicken your skills with magic energy.
Experiment with magic to expand your research.

name: animal companion
desc: Create a magic link with a wild animal.

name: summon familiar
desc: Prepare a rite for summoning a familiar. The exact shape will be chosen after the fact.

name: pet familiar
desc: Pet your familiar to calm your nerves.

name: planar exploration
desc: Explore the connections between this plane and the others.
flavor: Much like unraveling a spiderweb, it even includes the spider.

name: make amends
desc: Hard labor and charitable works can help cleanse the stain of prior evil acts.

name: security consultant
desc: Hire out your services to patrons wishing to protect their wealth.

name: gardener's almanac
desc: Advice on properly tending your garden for maximum yields.

name: decent
desc: You are turning out to be an upstanding spellcaster.

name: respectable
desc: You have become a respected personage in the magical world.

name: immoral
desc: You have taken your first steps on the path of evil. It's a good thing.

name: wicked
desc: Your wicked deeds put you on the sure path of evil. A few more steps, and there will be no turning back.
Benevolent to a fault, the light reveals its final secrets on your path of virtue.

name: incorruptible
desc: Truly, you are incorruptible, and the light recognizes the good in you.
needtext: Your evil must be 0 or lower. Your virtue must be 3,000 or higher. You must be tier 3 or higher.

name: scrupulous
desc: Scrupulous deeds and virtuous thoughts guide you closer to the light.
needtext: Your evil must be 0 or lower. Your virtue must be 1,500 or higher. You must be tier 1 or higher.

name: virtuous
desc: Your actions have shown you to be a virtuous wizard.
extdesc: You will automatically walk this path if you have completed the Neophyte stage of your journey, sufficient Virtue, and are clear of the taint of Evil. Other actions can trigger this as well, but you cannot select this action manually.

desc: Having shed some of the taint of your prior sinister acts, the light welcomes you back.

name: path of redemption
desc: Begin the path to redeem yourself from your evil ways.
needtext: You must have 1,250 or more Virtue to walk this path.

name: Naturally Balanced
desc: Having balanced yourself between the pulls of good and evil, the natural world reveals greater secrets still.

name: Spiritually Balanced
desc: Spirit, as the balance point between shadow and light, presents greater insights into itself now that you have reached equilibrium. You must be tier 4 or higher.

name: In Equilibrium
desc: You find equilibrium between the shadow and the light, leading to further balance between the various forces that drive the world.
needtext: You must be both Virtuous and Vile. Your Virtue and Evil must be at least 750 each and at least 2,000 combined. You must have both a spiritsource and a plantsource. You must be tier 3 or higher.

name: Balanced
desc: Balancing respectable and wicked acts, you ensure that both light and shadow can flourish without either becoming too powerful to constrain.
needtext: You must be both Wicked and Respectable. Your Virtue and Evil must be at least 350 each and at least 1,000 combined. You must have both a plantsource and a spiritsource. You must be tier 1 or higher.

desc: You vow to take a neutral stance in the battle between light and shadow - whether by maintaining active balance between the two, or by abstaining from that which would further either's goals.
needtext: If you did any of the tasks named: Decent/Immoral, Respectable/Wicked, or Virtuous/Vile, then you need to also do the one separated by a slash (Immoral if you did Decent, etc). If you have none of them, you qualify already. You must be tier 0 or higher.

name: Neutrality Forsaken
desc: You renouce your vow of neutrality to focus on other pursuits.
extdesc: Pursuing the Path of Balance or Path of Detachment will disable your ability to forsake your vow.

name: Detached
desc: Abstaining from the extreme acts of good and evil, you choose a path that detaches you from the moral conflicts of the world.
needtext: You must not be considered Virtuous or Vile, and your Virtue and Evil must be below 200 each. You must be tier 1 or higher.

name: Amoral
desc: Your journey of abstention has led to further enlightment. An amoral outlook isolates you from most of the world, and you find many doors are closed to you.
needtext: You must not be considered Respectable or Wicked, and your Virtue and Evil must be below 200 each. You must be tier 3 or higher.

name: Natural Amorality
desc: Removing yourself from the civilized world's concerns to focus on natural insights, you gain otherwise unattainable knowledge. You must be tier 4 or higher.

name: Spiritual Amorality
desc: Focusing on otherworldly pursuits rather than worldly concerns, you obtain surprising insights into spiritual matters. You must be tier 4 or higher.

name: path of corruption
desc: The shadow whispers promises of knowledge and power to you, if only you will heed the call.
needtext: You must have 750 or more Evil.

desc: Fallen from grace, once hailed as a hero. Now fully corrupted, the shadow helps you unlock secrets you thought lost to you.

name: vile
desc: Freed of pitiful notions of right, and morality, the dark arts lie open before you.
extdesc: You will automatically walk this path if you have completed the Neophyte stage of your journey and have sufficient Evil. Other actions can trigger this as well, but you cannot select this action manually.

name: sinister
desc: Sinister deeds unlock further secrets obscured by the shadow.
needtext: You must have 1,000 or more Evil. You must be tier 1 or higher.

name: irredeemable
desc: Prove yourself among the most irredeemable in the world.
needtext: You must have 2,000 or more Evil. You must be tier 3 or higher.

desc: Malevolent from the start, the shadow rewards your unending dedication to evil. You must be tier 4 or higher.

name: black book of ages
desc: The vellum is black, containing forbidden secrets written in blood. Just looking at it causes pain.
flavor: 'What knowledge do you seek?' the voices asked Vezial. 'Everything.'

name: critter dissections
desc: While preserving the specimens that passed away, you may as well study their insides.
flavor: Now dear old Ribbert will be immortalized in your research.

name: horse medicines
desc: Horses show great promise as experimental subjects for new tonics. Try some once they're done.
flavor: Healthy as a horse? No, more than that.

name: muscle studies
desc: Study the skeletal structure and musculature of countless beasts.
flavor: How does the cheetah run so fast? How can the giraffe support such limbs? Just what exactly is a platypus?

name: demonic examinations
desc: They may be reluctant subjects, but there's much to learn of how demons stabilize their bodies.

name: spirit examinations
desc: For all the pains, cajoling spirits pays off once you see how such ethereal creatures maintain their existences.

name: auto-vivisection
desc: You've mastered time magic enough to try things beyond lesser mages' wildest dreams. Some care setting up the loop, and finally you can examine yourself.
flavor: To think they dared call you heartless.

name: de humanis
desc: A sequel to one of your greatest hits.

name: rite of vitality
desc: The ancients hoped to attain longevity with the power of the cosmos. You can achieve vitality, at least.
flavor: Best to do it when the gods are preoccupied.

name: sanguine apotheosis
desc: Replace your blood with ichor, such that even the marrow ascends.

name: skeletal artifice
desc: Forge something greater into your skeleton and your skeleton into something greater.

name: planar vitality
desc: Limitless power wells up from the planes. Harness some for yourself.

name: spy
desc: Time to see what all those other wizards are up to.
flavor: ...What do you mean, they're just pacing around?

name: prepare dimensional probe
desc: Prepare your dimensional probe for another trip to the far planes.

name: accelerated preparations
desc: Put additional effort into speeding up the preparations.

name: primal attunement
desc: Attune to the primal manas of the planes for more efficient surveying.

name: effective preparations
desc: Infuse the probe with additional elemental energies for extra resilience and speed.

name: book of exeter
desc: A book full of wordplay and riddles compiled from your efforts to keep yourself amused during your studies.

name: win riddle competition
desc: Newly armed, go and win the riddling competition at the village's yearly fair.

name: design jester's motley
needtext: Must have at least 4 inventory spaces free.
desc: Craft a jester's motley to embody the principles of mayhem.

name: replace motley
needtext: Must have at least 4 inventory spaces free, even if you only need to replace part of the set.
desc: Remake your motley.

name: collect face
desc: Select and study a suitable target to be immortalized as your newest disguise.

name: pull out rabbit
desc: Materialize a helpful rabbit from seemingly thin air!

name: complete the collection
desc: You became a master of a thousand disguises, but one face remains to be mastered. Your own.

name: nourish sprout
desc: Nourish your idrasil sprout so it can grow into something greater.
extdesc: This will permanently lock the idrasil sprout and replace it with a better home.

name: nourish sapling
desc: Nourish your idrasil sapling so it can realize its full splendor.
extdesc: This will permanently lock the idrasil sapling and replace it with a better home.

name: restore ruins
desc: You realized the meaning of a crucial rune in the ruins and unlocked further depths. Now they simply need repairing.
flavor: Speak friend and enter

name: found collective
desc: Gather like-minded lovers of nature to establish a permanent collective in the wilderness.
extdesc: Unlocks a new home when completed.

name: establish caravan
desc: Convince various other small merchants of your trustworthiness and band together into a caravan.
extdesc: Unlocks a new home when completed.

name: build emporium
desc: Build a magnificient marketplace and make sure everyone knows.
extdesc: Unlocks a new home when completed.

name: excavate waterfall
desc: Dig out some more space behind the waterfall and raise the cliff it plunges over.
extdesc: This will permanently lock the Waterfall and unlock a new home when completed.

name: headmaster promotion
desc: Overcome your rival professors and win the promotion to headmaster for the sake of prestige and better lodgings.

name: citadel wings
desc: Add a couple of new wings onto your citadel for more room.

name: temple expansion
needtext: You need to have taken classes tagged 'Master of Divination' at least as many times as you've done this task. It still maxes at 3.
desc: Add a new floor onto the temple to keep up with your needs.

name: temple pinnacle
desc: Make your temple the highest in the land to gaze upon the stars.

name: castle restoration
desc: You deserve better. It's time to restore your ruined castle to its past splendor.
extdesc: This will permanently lock the Crumbling Castle and unlock a better home when completed.

name: palace restoration
desc: You deserve better. It's time to restore your ruined palace to its past splendor.
extdesc: This will permanently lock the Mouldering Palace and unlock a better home when completed.

name: grove trimming
desc: The plants have been carpeting the rest of your home, not just the floors. Time to see to that.

name: island management
desc: The ravages of nature have been collapsing parts of your structures. Time to see to that.

name: museum gallery
desc: Add a new gallery to your museum for your enjoyment.

name: attune to wilderness
needtext: Must live outdoors.
desc: Get comfortable in the middle of all the greenery.

name: attune to depths
needtext: Must live underground.
desc: Get comfortable deep beneath the ground.
flavor: The blue-gilled mushrooms are very pretty, though they taste awful.

name: lexyrinth browsing
desc: Stay hidden as you make copies of the tomes in the endless depths of the infinite library.
flavor: Things beyond even your comprehension lair here.

name: remold spire
desc: Your first attempt to raise a spire was rough. Refine its structure.

name: catasterismi
desc: Piece together the history of the stars and their followers. Much was lost when the Locks razed the lands in their rise to power.
flavor: The rites of nimble Glenmorgue. The trials of armored el-Adke. The shrines of singing Pendra.

name: picatrix
desc: Experimental procedures for the application of astronomy to magic.

name: aryabhatiya
desc: The practical applications of astronomy to the measurement of time and distance.

name: record stars
needtext: You need a starsource and a workspace.
desc: Record the constellations and the wanderers.

name: blood siphon
desc: Leech blood from a body to restore your health.

name: one with nature
desc: You have become as one with nature after communing with it for so long.
